abstract: From the printing press to the Google glasses, the earliest lumbering efforts in technology morph over time into streamlined, unnoticed tools of daily life, writes Nick Bilton.
snippet: From the printing press to the Google glasses, the earliest lumbering efforts in technology morph over time into streamlined, unnoticed tools of daily life, writes Nick Bilton.
lead_paragraph: I have seen the future, and it is wearable.

headline.main: Disruptions: Next Step for Technology Is Becoming the Background
